database

Class DBcontroller

  • java.lang.Object
    • database.DBcontroller
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    database.DBcontrollerInterface

    public class DBcontroller
extends java.lang.Object
implements database.DBcontrollerInterface
    Implementation of the DB interface for the DB view
    Author:
    Micha, Daniel
    See Also:
    DBcontrollerInterface

      DBcontroller()
      A public constructor to connect to DB and create the database table

    • Method Detail

      • insertEvent

        public void insertEvent(java.lang.String playerID,
                        int gameID,
                        int gameScore,
                        Utilities.EventType event)
                 throws java.sql.SQLException
        Description copied from interface: database.DBcontrollerInterface
        Insert an event to the DB
        Specified by:
        insertEvent in interface database.DBcontrollerInterface
        Parameters:
        playerID - player's name, string inserted by the user
        gameID - game's ID. To insert, get current number of games and increment it by 1 to avoid collisions
        gameScore - game's score at the moment of the event
        event - event type (EventType options: HIT, MISS, END_GAME)
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - DB SQL exceptions

        Get current number of games
        Specified by:

      • getAllGamesByMostEventsDescending

        public java.util.ArrayList<database.Record> getAllGamesByMostEventsDescending(Utilities.EventType event)
                                                                       throws java.sql.SQLException
        Description copied from interface: database.DBcontrollerInterface
        Get all the games, sorted by number of events of a certain type, descending
        Specified by:
        getAllGamesByMostEventsDescending in interface database.DBcontrollerInterface
        Parameters:
        event - type of event to count, (EventType options: MISS, HIT. END_GAME is not relevant for this query (1 per game)).
        Returns:
        ArrayList of Record selected in the DB
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - DB SQL exceptions
